tool_description: Selects appropriate ground motion parameters and design response spectra based on seismic hazard maps and site conditions.

latitude.description: Site latitude in decimal degrees, range -90 to 90

longitude.description: Site longitude in decimal degrees, range -180 to 180

site_class.description: Site class from soil classification (A, B, C, D, E, or F)

risk_category.description: Building risk category (I, II, III, or IV)

design_code.description: Design code standard (ASCE7, NBC, Eurocode8, etc.)

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be -90 to 90, longitude -180 to 180. Verify site location.
Invalid site class: Must be A, B, C, D, E, or F. Use Seismic Site Classifier tool first.
Invalid risk category: Must be I, II, III, or IV per building code occupancy classification.
Location outside design code jurisdiction: Specified code may not apply to this geographic location.
usage: Provide site coordinates, site class from soil analysis, and building risk category. Tool retrieves seismic parameters from hazard maps and generates design response spectrum.

response_spectrum_periods.description: Period values for design response spectrum

response_spectrum_accelerations.description: Spectral acceleration values for design response spectrum
